data.suggestion: Clovis' execution of Roan reimagined à la Captain Needa's fatal apology to Vader in Empire Strikes Back. "I will take full responsibility and apologize to Prince Clovis..."
Eric wakes up one day with a dream. A harem of keidran girls. (Helltaker Parody)
Beauty and the Beast Trace as a white tiger and Flora as a human, in formal wear and dancing
Samurai Adelaide Full body Adelaide dressed up like this female samurai
TwoKinds High: Secret Ending with VV-Mike
Mike's Harem Anime. Mike is overwhelmed as he sits with Erilas, the wolf girl, the coyote girl, the bunny girl, Kat and female Evals and they all wanna piece of him.
Laura as an astronomer, examining the sky on a clear, frosty night.
A cute western Basitin flirts with Madelyn while she is undercover and she panics.
Reni, in her anthro form, tries to explain to Nora that proportions affect balance. Nora responds by bwoming Reni, saying it's much more fun that way.
Willow Daki
Clovis' cousin, Captain Jenny, commands her motley crew
Date night! Raine and Zen sat together on a park bench
The biological differences of the 3 species of Mekkan, maybe taught by Raine.
Good Morning Jenny
Kitsune Laura healing a dying human adventurer Keith in her forest.
Raine (Halfkind form) and Red are building Snow-Sneps in the garden!
Zen and Natani have a sparring match. It ends after one punch since they feel each others pain
Nora gets a taste of her own medicine when she's hit by her own curse and suddenly can't stop acting like a dog. Trace, finding this hilarious, wonders aloud what tricks she can do. "Don't you dare!"
Zen and Human Raine in a cozy cafe, Sitting together by a window. Watching the rain fall on a bustling city street.
Couples retreat, Reni with Keiren went to the couples retreat finding Reni's Mother and father there sharing baby pictures of Reni to Kei embarrassing her.
Two sided daki of female clovis in a red night gown and the other side without the gown but featuring clovic's back side.
Ear scritches: keidran reaction vs basitin reaction
Keith reading an adventure novel to Natani and Natani becomes very interested in the story
Sythe druid of the forest (with nibbly)
Kat and Zen kiss in a shower
Good morning Brutus. Just a pose of Brutus waking up in the morning
While Trace is showering, Flora is pawing at the gap under the door, wanting to be let in from outside.
Choosing the "flirt" option when you meet Sahari, the sphinx in the maze
Lady Nora meets with Willow's mother in the forest, and sees what she has become.
Good morning, Princess Reni.
Coming upon Clovis unexpectedly, Natani casts the first thing that comes to mind. Heart's Desire. Clovis is defeated after he cannot give up Brutus a second time...
Reni accidentally acquires a cult of Kobolds that worship her.
Kathrin chasing a laser
Snow Leopard Village continuation: This time with some fluff between our new married couple (romantic kiss)
Children in a library want to pet Stilt wolf but she's too tall.
Cat Maren loses control of/gives into her instincts and starts to catch Mrs. Nibbly
Redux Mike x Evals
Rose: there will be no talking or sleeping in my classroom. Flora: heh rules who ever listens to that?! Rose: gives out a dirty look Flora: right! Rules love them!
Nibbly enjoys some nuts, from her new nut sack. What? Every squirrel needs to store them somewhere.
Raine as Nessa from Pokemon Sword and Shield. (Wolf form)
Kathrin get's a little too excited and began making outfits for all her versions (Boy, Cat, Dog, Feral, ect.)
Laura walks in, pleasantly surprised to see a shocked, newly transformed Very Vixen Keith
Nora's early years, when she was as young and shy as Reni. She takes a human form for the first time to impress people.
AU: Brutus leaves Clovis for Captain Jenny and lives happily ever after
Adult Maddie and Maeve in the “human only” bath, with Maddie once again flustered at the situation.
Flora decides to test Stoney to see if he'll make a good companion for her baby when it's born later on. She likes him! Good boy!
The Chimera meets red and he thinks she's a monster attacking
Keith, Natani, and Laura, making each other flower crowns and cuddling on a hilltop at sunset.
Twokinds High: Reni is embarrassed when she is politely told her dragon form is a bit too much for the school track to take. The field behind her has seen... better days.
Raine as Vocaloid Miku Hatsune
Good Morning Alaric
Mike and Evals are tasked with taking down the magic mistletoe because no one else wants to get close to it.
Captain Jenny, Queen of the Pirates, dueling Clovis, the Queen of Greed to see who is the true Empress of the Criminals. Sword vs spell as a form of Keidran Pirate vs Ninja.
Nora’s 1st Mate The moments before Nora and her 1st mate (maybe genderbent) sleep together for the first time.
Zen and Kat are being chased by attacking snowmen that they made, the mana crystals they used as decorations was not a good idea
Nora keeps swapping Mike in and out of his VV form. Evals isn't sure how to react.
Raine in a modern setting and in human form, is cozily typing up some fiction in a quiet night.
Natani body pillow
Natani, Zen and Keith as the Spanish Inquisition from Monty Python. Nobody expects the Spanish Inquisition!
Taunting the Dragon part 2 POOF! Anthro Nora is now dancing with Trace and a feral kitty Flora is on the table where Nora was. Turns out taunting a Dragon is not the best idea!

Before meeting Euchre or becoming Grand Templar, Mary Silverlock, as a young adult, turns into a Snow Wolf Keidran. She uses transformation magic, in her private quarters, to test how it works out of morbid curiosity and refine it.
A terrified keith is pushed over the edge by Natani (literally) as she teaches him cliff diving
Sequel to Double Date: The group have a nice dinner in spite of the awkwardness
Mike kisses Evals who is reluctant at first but then gets more into it (both Male)
Brutus and Clovis meeting for the first time. How did they meet?
gender-swap AU, male Flora finding out that he got female Trace pregnant.
Evals wakes up in Mike's bed, again.
Laura getting ready to play monster hunter
Both Nora and Flora are tired of competing with each other for Trace's affection, so they decide to do dbz style fusion
Rose, Raine, Kathrin and Cat Nora as Lady Demetrescu and the Vampire sisters from Resident Evil Village
Mike pulls Very Vixen Mike out of a hat! (Hat Trick sequel/parody).
Templar Propaganda Pamphlet. EvilTrace pointing at the viewer, eyes glowing blue with the words “I want you to join the Templars” on the lower half of the pamphlet.
We've seen what Laura and Trace are like off-set, what are "Keith" and Natani like? (Follow-up to Couples Off Set)
The player checks out Laura's gaming club in the TK High VN.
Willow meets Nora, bonding over shared memories of Willow's mother (Probably scary ones).
Maddie dressed as Ed from Cowboy Bebop

A minor diplomatic incident occurs when the Tiger diplomatic party is invited to the Legacy estate for negotiations. Where they are introduced to the Legacys, much to Iris's embarrassment, and Flora's schadenfreude.
Flora introduces Trace to her father. How does her dad react to the news of his new grandchild and son-in-law?
Group A arrives to the Bastion Islands to find out that Laura somehow became king of the island- even she was not completely sure how it happened
Mafia Nat and Zen are ordered to perform a hit on Keith (Member of Flora and Trace's gang) but things don't go as planned
Maddie and Maeve pretend to be dragon slayers, to Lady Nora’s annoyance.
Modern Flora frets in the changing room mirror as she tries on a pair of jeans that are just a size too small to fit over her butt. Outside the curtain, Trace pretends not to be interested.
More Youngtani messing with Clovis, lifting the princess' tail to admire her backside, while Clovis continues trying to regain control.
Flora, Trace, Natani, and Keith take couples dancing lessons!
Remus wearing the cone of shame after his run in with nibs
Willow reference sheet
Big maine coon cats, all the Maine coon cats, all big and fluffy!
Red thinks Raine has a secret assertive side when he reads one of her fanfics. A second panel shows a scene similar to "aggressive" but with Raine in place of Laura.
Half-keidran Raine meets human Holo from the “Spice and Wolf”.
Natani as Aloy in the world of Horizon: Zero Dawn, maybe riding an overridden Strider
Nibbly saving Sythe from Remus as pictured in Nibbly's mind, an epic "You shall not pass!" type of moment.
Kathrin and Raine go for drinks at the Riftwall.
Ivy Daki
Trace overhears Keith and Natani talking about tying the knot, and it turns out to be them just comparing the usefulness and practicality of various types of knots
Flora & Trace (Keidran tiger form) as mermaids, sharing a romantic embrace with each other under the sea. (Preferably have Flora topless).
Good Morning Zen
Saria and Rose get drunk in the wine cellar to celebrate Rose's birthday
Ghost Brutus Haunting Clovis in a comical way.
Reni modeling lingerie for her special someone.
